A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie is a mess.. riddled with cheesy Disney jokes and one liners.. Luke barely even trains Rey and then at the end he disappears (dies) for no reason and joins the Force ending his long awaited come back which was uneventful... ruining decades of character development... I enjoyed the Force Awakens and what it would lead to with the series and it just ended up in complete sh*t.
